heading: HB00102
0: AN ACT PROTECTING THE PHYSICAL INTEGRITY OF A CULTURAL PROPERTY, PENALIZING ANY OBSTRUCTION TO ITS VIEW AND SIGHTLINE, AMENDING FOR THE PURPOSE REPUBLIC ACT     NO. 10066 OTHERWISE KNOWN AS THE "NATIONAL CULTURAL HERITAGE ACT OF 2009"
status: Pending with the Committee on BASIC EDUCATION AND CULTURE since 2019-07-23
